title: Danydee
author: Danydee
created_time: January 07, 2023, 09:04:11 PMLast edit: January 07, 2023, 11:39:28 PM by Danydee
content: I'm in need of a 0.003 ETH loan, for few hours no more.. I need em to pay Gas fees to be able to exchange some tokens I own!so juste the time I swap some tokens to ETH and I repay 0.006 ETH + the tx fees engaged by you !If interested let me know so I post the address and I mark the deal as Taken!Thank you

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: Danydee on January 07, 2023, 09:04:11 PMI'm in need of a 0.003 ETH loan, for few hours no more.. I need em to pay Gas fees to be able to exchange some tokens I own!so juste the time I swap some tokens to ETH and I repay 0.006 ETH + the tx fees engaged by you !If interested let me know so I post the address and I mark the deal as Taken!Thank you It is too small a loan. So, I am able to provide you with the loan. I will send it from Binance and the transaction fee will be 0.0012 ETH. As you are providing repay 0.006 ETH + the tx fees engaged the total repayment amount should be about 0.0072 ETH. If it is okay with you then you can post your ETH wallet id, thanks.Edit: Sorry minimum send amount is 0.0098 ETH you may receive about 0.0086 ETH.

comments.body: Here I am  I just sent repayment for (0.0098 + 0.004) 0.0138 ETH .. 0x4481e2e9fd18bb39991ce46e971b3c27a1739edfe7cacbed77478f9f91b76d0cThank you so much, it is always a great pleasure working with you!Thank you so much

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: Danydee on January 07, 2023, 11:38:20 PMHere I am  I just sent repayment for (0.0098 + 0.004) 0.0138 ETH .. 0x4481e2e9fd18bb39991ce46e971b3c27a1739edfe7cacbed77478f9f91b76d0cThank you so much, it is always a great pleasure working with you!Thank you so much I am just confirming that I have received the amount you have mentioned here and which was confirmed through the Bitcointalk personal message. Thank you very much for the repayment too fast. Actually, I wouldn't send you the fund but based on the requested amount I thought you need it urgently and you will pay it back obviously. Thanks once again.
